#Text=Description de l'emploi\r

#Text=Roles and Responsibilities\r
#Text=\r

#Text=� Be responsible for providing technical leadership and defining, developing, and evolving software in a fast paced and agile development environment using the latest software development m and infrastructure\r

#Text=� Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, leveraging product and technology reuse\r
#Text=� Capture system level requirements by brainstorming with CTO, Sr.

#Text=Be responsible for providing technical leadership and defining, developing, and evolving software in a fast paced and agile development environment using the latest software development m and infrastructure\r
#Text=Provide guidance to developers with either planning and execution and/or design architecture using agile methodologies such as SCRUM\r
#Text=Work with Product Line Leaders (PLLs) to understand product requirements & vision\r
#Text=Drive increased efficiency across the teams, eliminating duplication, leveraging product and technology reuse\r
#Text=Capture system level requirements by brainstorming with CTO, Sr\r
#Text=Leads impact assessment and decision related to technology choices, design /architectural considerations and implementation strategy\r
#Text=Facilitates and coaches software engineering team sessions on requirements estimation and alternative approaches to team sizing and estimation\r
#Text=Leads a community of practice around estimation to share best practices among teams\r
#Text=Drives accountability and adoption\r
#Text=Publishes guidance and documentation to promote adoption of design\r
#Text=Proposes design solutions based on research and synthesis; creates general design principles that capture the vision and critical concerns for a program\r
#Text=Demonstrates mastery of the intricacies of interactions and dynamics in Agile teams\r
#Text=Guides new teams to adopt Agile, troubleshoots adoption efforts, and guide continuous improvement\r
#Text=Provides training on Lean / Agile\r
#Text=Drives elimination of inefficiencies in coding process\r
#Text=Teaches XP practices to others\r
#Text=Actively embraces new methods and practices that increase efficiency and effectiveness\r
